summary: Simple retexture of the Ebony Mail to show the patterns up in white. Now in male and female
descriptionHtml:
Simple retexture of the Ebony Mail to show the patterns up in white. Only on the female armour though. Will get to doing the male in the next few days.
EDIT: Now done the male version. Took a while, but it\'s there.

First mod from me, so any constructive criticism will be very much appreciated.
If some people actually want me to, I may do other colours for the highlights, but it may take a while for me to get it done. This took me quite a long time to do. I found that yellow made an interesting effect so I may include something like that in the near future.

Be sure to leave a comment!

-Install-
In case you\'re not sure, just dump the textures folder straight into the data folder in your Skyrim directory.

-Credits-
Credit to Bethesda for making this brilliant game, and credit to the work of all those modders who inspired me to give it a go myself.

-Permissions-
In the case you want to use this for whatever reason, just ask me and agree to give me credit, and I\'ll probably say yes.
author: Deathraker
